attributes.comment: Many patients wish to choose a provider of the same sex, for reasons of comfort and safety, particularly for invasive treatments or situations where the patient is vulnerable. This information about the provider ought to be available to patients. Whatever new regulations are made, sex and gender identity must never be conflated, nor should subjective gender identity be allowed to usurp the factual and material category of sex.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
